metadata.title: CVE-2015-7946 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Information Exposure vulnerability in Unity8 as used on the Ubuntu phoneand possibly also in Unity8 shipped elsewhere. This allows an attacker toenable the MTP service by opening the emergency dialer. Fixed in8.11+16.04.20160111.1-0ubuntu1 and 8.11+15.04.20160122-0ubuntu1.

criterions.comment: unity8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
